channel.title: Use the recommended sign-in solution: redirect model :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Use the recommended sign-in solution: redirect model Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Description: In phase 1, if “Setting up okta org policies” can be unified into one place for all (redirect and embedded) guides, we’ll have to add a specific set-up guide for redirect and each of the embedded models.

item.title: Sign users in to your SPA
item.description: Sign users in to your SPA Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Combine this doc with the following doc unless there is a strong reason to split out Auth JS This document will need to be refactored in one of the phases.

item.title: Sign users in to your web app
item.description: Sign users in to your web app Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: Sign users in to your web app using the redirect model: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/sign-into-web-app-redirect/asp-net-core-3/main/ Page type: Task

item.title: Sign users in to your mobile app
item.description: Sign users in to your mobile app Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal application builders, Saas Builder Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: Sign users in to your mobile app using the redirect model: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/sign-into-mobile-app-redirect/android/main/ Page type: Task
